# extendedDynamicRangeHeadroom

**Instance Property**

The amount of headroom available for extended dynamic range content.

## Declaration

```swift
var extendedDynamicRangeHeadroom: Float { get set }
```

## Discussion

When EDR output is enabled using [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/RealityRenderer/extendedDynamicRangeOutput], standard dynamic range values output by this [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/RealityRenderer] will be scaled such that there’s some *headroom* to display extended range values.

This value is in the range `[1.0-16.0]`. The default value is `2.0`.
